ModMetaData.name: MorrowRim - Grazelands
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a new Morrowind inspired biome, the Grazelands, along with a wild new plant. Grazelands biomes will generate randomly on top of ashlands biomes, using BiomesKit by Odeum.

Flat pastoral land, covered in grass and occasional mushroom trees. These plains were once covered in clouds of ash from a nearby volcano, now the clouds have settled, and much of the ash has been absorbed into the ground. Much like the ashlands, the terrain here is highly fertile, though large swathes of this fertility have been lost over time, and there is an almost complete lack of ash storms to replenish it.

-Requires Harmony.
-Requires BiomesKit, or any other mod that implements BiomesKit.
-Requires MorrowRim.
-Includes several patches to add wild animals and plants to this biome.
-Includes several patches for Vanilla Expanded mods.
-Includes a patch for RimBees, adding wild hives.
-Includes a patch for Camouflage and Stealth, with the biome using desert camo.
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
